directions:
Meatballs

Place a small bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in bread and milk. Set bowl aside and leave to soak.

Place parsley and garlic into mixing bowl and chop 5 sec/speed 7. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add ground beef, eggs, salt, and black pepper. Squeeze milk out of bread and discard milk. Add bread into mixing bowl and mix 10 sec/speed 5. Transfer into a bowl.

Grease the Varoma dish and tray. Shape small meatballs (1½ in.) with oiled hands and place them into Varoma dish and tray. Set aside.

Tomato Sauce

Place garlic, onions and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop 5 sec/speed 5, then sauté 3 min/250°F/speed 1.

Add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and cook 20 min/Varoma/speed 1. Serve meatballs hot with sauce.

Tips & tricks

Use any white or light crusty bread such as baguette, ciabatta, country bread, whole wheat bread or bread rolls.

Cook until the meatballs reach an internal temperature of 165°F as measured with a food thermometer before removing meat from the heat source.

Serve Meatballs with rice or steamed potatoes.

Part or all of the ground beef can be replaced with ground veal, pork or chicken.

Add 2 oz grated Parmesan cheese and chop with parsley and garlic.

Replace canned tomatoes with fresh tomatoes and crush with salt and pepper 7 sec/speed 6 before continuing as directed by the recipe.

Add Italian herbs or oregano, thyme and basil to Meatballs for more flavor.

Meatballs

Place a small bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in bread and milk. Set bowl aside and leave to soak.

Place parsley and garlic into mixing bowl and chop 5 sec/speed 7. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add ground beef, eggs, salt, and black pepper. Squeeze milk out of bread and discard milk. Add bread into mixing bowl and mix 10 sec/speed 5. Transfer into a bowl.

Grease the Varoma dish and tray. Shape small meatballs (1½ in.) with oiled hands and place them into Varoma dish and tray. Set aside.

Place garlic, onions and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop 5 sec/speed 5, then sauté 3 min/250°F/speed 1.

Add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and cook 20 min/Varoma/speed 1. Serve meatballs hot with sauce.

Tips & tricks

Use any white or light crusty bread such as baguette, ciabatta, country bread, whole wheat bread or bread rolls.

Cook until the meatballs reach an internal temperature of 165°F as measured with a food thermometer before removing meat from the heat source.

Serve Meatballs with rice or steamed potatoes.

Part or all of the ground beef can be replaced with ground veal, pork or chicken.

Replace canned tomatoes with fresh tomatoes and crush with salt and pepper 7 sec/speed 6 before continuing as directed by the recipe.

Add Italian herbs or oregano, thyme and basil to Meatballs for more flavor.
html.ingredients:
Meatballs

2 oz bread, fresh or stale, cubed

3 oz whole milk

6 - 12 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only

1 garlic clove (optional)

16 oz ground beef, crumbled

2 eggs

½ tsp salt

1 pinch ground black pepper

oil, to grease

Tomato Sauce

1 garlic clove

2 - 3 oz yellow onions, halved

1 oz extra virgin olive oil

30 oz canned crushed tomatoes

1 tsp salt

1 pinch ground black pepper
